data.name: dbChoice_FileNotExist
data.value: Warning, the file you have selected does not exist. [CR] If you wish to create / repair & compact an 'Information Base' file [CR] you must select an existing file!

data.name: dbChoice_FileCannotFind
data.value: This 'Information Base' file cannot be found![CR2]You may wish to remove this listing, this can be[CR]done through the maintenance screen!

data.name: Export_MustSelSomething
data.value: You must select something to export!

data.name: Export_OnlyExportDirectChild
data.value: You may only export branches and their direct child branches!

data.name: Export_MustSpecifyFile
data.value: You must specify a filename for your export / import file.

data.name: Export_WarningTopic
data.value: Topic: [Title] requires a missing user template file

data.name: Export_WarningMisingBook
data.value: Bookmark: [Bookmark] refers to a missing topic

data.name: Export_WarningMissingTemplFile
data.value: Template menu item: [TemplateName] is linked to a missing template file

data.name: Export_CannotSelThisTopic
data.value: This topic can not be selected as it contains template data.

data.name: Ideaspad_EssentialFilesMissing
data.value: Some essential program files are missing, please re-install the program!

data.name: Ideaspad_PrevConfigFound
data.value: A previous configuration has been found would you like to use it?

data.name: Ideaspad_LicenseNotAccepted
data.value: Your license code was not accepted!

data.name: Ideaspad_IBFNewer
data.value: The 'Information Base' file you have opened was created with a newer version of [Program]! [CR2]You must use the check for updates feature to update your program!

data.name: Ideaspad_ErrorThenCFU
data.value: [CR2]Please use the 'Check for Updates' feature, which will be shown after this message.[CR]A newer version of the program should have fixed any problems in older versions.[CR]If you have tried the 'Check for Updates' feature and already have the latest version[CR]of the program please refer to the help file for support details.

data.name: Ideaspad_IconCompatCFUWarn
data.value: The Icon Pack which you are using requires a more up-to-date version of [Program].[CR]Please use the check for updates feature to get the latest version of the program.

data.name: Ideaspad_IconCompatCFUError
data.value: The Icon Pack which you are using requires a more up-to-date version of [Program].[CR]As this version of program is really old, you MUST use the check for updates feature to continue using the program.

data.name: Import_FirstSelFile
data.value: You must first select an import file!

data.name: Import_WarnNewerVerion
data.value: WARNING: This import file was exported from a newer version of [Program]![CR]Please use the 'Check for Updates' feature to download the latest version of the program and retry!

data.name: IpstdOnly_ThanksForEval
data.value: Thank you for Evaluating [Program]. Copyright Mindwarp Consultancy Ltd 2004

data.name: IpSplash_PressShift
data.value: Press the SHIFT key now to select a different Information Base file.

data.name: Main_TemplateNotFound
data.value: Template not found, please check you have the required template file!

data.name: Main_SomeoneModified
data.value: Someone else has modified this topic while you have been using it![CR]Do you wish to overwrite it or cancel any changes you have made?[CR2]The persons user name and modfied date are show below:

data.name: Main_DeletedLoose
data.value: This topic has been deleted since you started using it! Any changes you made will be lost!

data.name: Main_ChangedLoose
data.value: The topic has been changed from a template to RTF! Any changes you made will be lost!

data.name: Maint_Exceeded
data.value: Your 'Information Base' was not added, you may have execeeded the amount allowed!

data.name: Maint_WordDescription
data.value: Please enter a Word to describe this information!

data.name: Maint_OpenTitle
data.value: Now select the Information Base file!

data.name: Maint_SaveTitle
data.value: Now specify the Information Base file!

data.name: Maint_BesideError
data.value: Unable to create file! This may be because the program [CR]wasn't able to run fast enough on this computer! Error code [Code]

data.name: Maint_NewIBCreated
data.value: New Information Base created, now select 'Open Existing Information Base' to open the file!

data.name: Maint_RenameSelect
data.value: Please ensure that you have the 'Information Base' you wish to rename, from the previous screen selected!

data.name: Maint_RenameName
data.value: Please enter a new name for the selected 'Information Base'!

data.name: Maint_DeleteSelect
data.value: Please ensure that you have the 'Information Base' you wish to delete, from the previous screen selected!

data.name: Maint_DeleteDenied
data.value: Access Denied, you may not delete your last file!

data.name: Maint_DeleteConfirm
data.value: Please confirm that you wish to delete the 'Information Base' [ShortName] from the system?

data.name: Maint_DeleteInUse
data.value: The Information Base file may be in use! Can not Delete!

data.name: Maint_DeleteSuccess
data.value: 'Information Base' [ShortName] has been removed from the system!

data.name: Maint_RepairConfirm
data.value: Do you wish to Repair/Compact the selected 'Information Base' file? [CR]File : [File][CR2]This process keeps a backup of your database, just in case the compact [CR]process fails. By continuing the backup from last time will be deleted! [CR2]Do you wish to proceed?

data.name: Maint_RepairProblem
data.value: There has been a problem, please refer to our web site for help on this matter!

data.name: Maint_RepairOptions
data.value: Please select which repair feature you'd like to use, either (YES/NO) :- [CR2][TAB]Repair & Compact = YES[CR2][TAB]OR[CR2][TAB]Data Fix = NO[CR2]NB. Before using the Data Fix feature please gain assistance from [CR]Mindwarp Consultancy Ltd, this can be done via the web site. [CR2]Please ensure that no other user is using the 'Information Base' [CR]before proceeding with either of the repair features.

data.name: Maint_RepairFixedButFound
data.value: The Data Fix process found a problem and fixed it!

data.name: Maint_RepairNotFixed
data.value: The Data Fix process wasn't able to repair the problem, please use the support[CR]feature on the Mindwarp Consultancy Website to gain assistance!

data.name: Options_SelectCSS
data.value: Select a Colour Scheme file / Cascading Style Sheet

data.name: Options_MustTemplate
data.value: If you select to use Templates by default, you must specify a template!

data.name: Options_MustTopic
data.value: You must select a topic if you want to have a topic displayed at startup!

data.name: Options_IconDirTooLong
data.value: Your folder is too long, it must be 255 characters or less!

data.name: Pad_MustSelectParent
data.value: You must select a parent branch, or if you haven't got any branches [CR]yet, use 'New Root Branch' from the File menu to create one!

data.name: Pad_BranchCharWarn
data.value: The '~' is used by the system, please try again!

data.name: Pad_MustSelectABranch
data.value: You must select a branch first!

data.name: Pad_SevenDaysleft
data.value: This trial will expire in seven days or less![CR2]If you like this product and wish to continue using it after the trial [CR]expires you must buy it. Please see out latest purchasing information [CR]on our web site. This can be accessed via the 'Help > Purchasing' [CR]option on the menu.

data.name: Pad_90To30Message
data.value: This version of the program will from now on normally be a 30 day trial. As you have upgraded from an older version of the program (90 day version) you are entitled to the 90 day (approx) trial. Please ignore any reference to 30 days in the package!

data.name: Pad_AskQuickLaunch
data.value: Would you like to add a shortcut to this program to your Quick Launch bar?

data.name: Pad_MustDeleteChilds
data.value: This topic has child branches, you would have to delete them first before deleting this branch!

data.name: Pad_WarnNotLinked
data.value: WARNING: This branch is not linked anywhere else, by deleting it you will not be able to view it.

data.name: Pad_DoDelete
data.value: Do you wish to delete this topic?

data.name: Pad_PrintTmpMissing
data.value: A required file to enable template printing was not found!

data.name: Pad_MustUseDelBranch
data.value: You must use 'Delete branch' to delete a branch with no sub branches!

data.name: Pad_ConfirmDelBranches
data.value: Do you wish to delete this branch and all its sub branches?

data.name: Pad_MustSelBranchBook
data.value: You must select a branch to make a bookmark!

data.name: Pad_SpellingSetError
data.value: No dictionary has been installed!, please goto the 'Tools' menu and select 'Options', then 'Spelling'.

data.name: Pad_TempToRTFWarn
data.value: Do you want to use rich text instead of a template? [CR2]WARNING: You will loose any data you have used in the template!

data.name: Pad_DefaultTopicChanged
data.value: The default startup topic has been changed!

data.name: Pad_RapidEntySetWarn
data.value: Rapid Entry must have a Default template, please specify one, goto the 'Tools' menu and select 'Options', then 'Templates'. [CR2]Alternatively select a template from the 'Template' menu, then select 'Rapid Entry'.

data.name: Pad_NewsBody
data.value: mailto:Newsletters-IP@example.com?subject=Newsletter Subscriptions Dept&body=Dear Sirs, Kindly add me to your [Program] Newsletter!

data.name: Pad_NewsFallback
data.value: Please check you that you have an email program installed on your computer (e.g. Outlook).[CR]Alternatively, send an email to [Email] to be added to the newsletter mailing list.

data.name: Pad_ImageError
data.value: A problem has occurred trying to insert your image file.[CR2]The file may be too big or may be an incompatible format. Acceptable formats are BMP, JPG, GIF, ICO, and PNG and others.

data.name: Pad_GraphicFilter
data.value: Compuserve Graphics Interchange (*.gif)|*.gif|JPEG - JFIF Compliant (*.jpg, *.jif, *.jpeg)|*.jpg;*.jif;*.jpeg|Portable Network Graphics (*.png)|*.png|Windows or OS/2 Bitmap (*.bmp)|*.bmp|Icon file (*.ico)|*.ico|All Files|*.*

data.name: Pad_SortAlphaToSeqMsg
data.value: [Program] is currently set to alphabetical branch sorting on this computer.[CR](Therefore you would not see any change, by moving this branch)[CR2]Would you like to change to sequence number sorting?

data.name: Pad_ProbWithUserIcons
data.value: A problem has been found with one of your icons:

data.name: Pad_ProblemWithFile
data.value: There was a problem opening the file!

data.name: Pad_CorruptIB
data.value: Your 'Information Base' file may have become corrupted, please use the Maintenance -> Repair feature to fix the problem!

data.name: RapEnt_MustFieldTopicname
data.value: You MUST provide a topic name in your chosen field / item! [CR2][FormUsage][CR2]If you wish to proceed and loose your changes click YES

data.name: RapEnt_EnterTopicName
data.value: You must enter a topic / branch name in your chosen field / item!

data.name: RapEnt_ChkUseDropHas
data.value: The drop down list '[Name]' has a value, this may the default value!

data.name: Remind_Goodwill
data.value: As matter of 'Good Will' to customers who may have vital or important information held within [CR]the program, you may use the 'Save to File' feature. This feature will allow you to have your [CR]information put into an RTF (Rich Text Format) document file. This can then be open in a [CR]word processing package. e.g. Wordpad.[CR2]If you wish to proceed click YES.

data.value: Show topic / branch names in file

data.value: Show topic / branch names on print out

data.value: You must specify a name for your information! Please re-run this program!

data.name: Startup_MustCreate
data.value: You must create an 'Information Base' file!

data.name: Startup_TrialNotice
data.value: Please make a written note of the date you installed [CR]this software as your 30 day (approx) trial of [Program] will start [CR]on that date! [CR2]Thank you for choosing to evaluate this software![CR2]Mindwarp Consultancy Ltd. 2004

data.name: TempSel_NoID
data.value: The Template you have chosen does not have a Template ID, please see help topic on creating templates!

data.name: TempSel_IDAlready
data.value: The Template ID is already in use by a system template!

data.name: TempSel_SameID
data.value: A template with the same identity with different fields has already been used! [CR]Please ensure you wish to proceed, information may be lost!

data.name: Strat1LM_RevokeWarning
data.value: WARNING: Do not proceed unless you are 100% sure you wish to Revoke the selected user.[CR]They will no longer be able to access this 'Information Base' file.[CR2]Proceed?

data.name: Strat1_Revoked
data.value: Your license has been revoked by another user on your network, please contact your systems administrator!

data.name: Strat1LM_Exceed
data.value: The user license will not permit any more users, please revoke more user(s)

data.name: Strat1LM_Added
data.value: You have been added to the system, you may now proceed!

data.name: Strat1_AccessDenied
data.value: Access Denied! There are insufficient users licenses.[CR2]To gain access to the system you must have a user license![CR]Either revoke an existing license from another user or buy further licenses.

data.value: In the future, we'd like to send you update newsletters about future releases also promotional offer emails.

data.value: You may not use the current Icon Pack as it was designed for an older version of the program!

data.value: This program is at least six months old, there may now be a newser version.[CR2]Would you like to check for updates?

data.value: At some point the program has created a problem report.[CR2]Please send us this report.
